text:
Boston - Full time - Onsite

COMPANY: Amadeus (www.amadeus.com) Amadeus provides the technology, which keeps the travel sector moving - from initial search to making a booking, from pricing to ticketing, from managing reservations to managing check-in and departure processes.

JOB: We're looking for talented C++ and Python engineers for a huge project involving teams from three continents. If interested read more and apply here: https://career012.successfactors.eu/career?career_ns=job_lis...
